meanings.meaning: 1. pole この磁場の線が２極で北の磁力と南の磁力の間に走っています。The lines of this field run between magnetic north and magnetic south at the two poles.
2. climax; extreme; extremity; culmination; height; zenith; nadir
1. quite; very Usually written using kana alone
2. 10^48; quindecillion Only applies to 極
3. Field
極く 【ごく】
極く: Irregular okurigana usage.

sentences.translation: The lines of this field run between magnetic north and magnetic south at the two poles.

meanings.meaning: 1. end; limit; extremity Archaic
極 【はたて】、尽 【はたて】、果 【はたて】
果: Irregular okurigana usage.
1. to decide; to choose; to determine; to make up one's mind; to resolve; to set one's heart on; to settle; to arrange; to set; to appoint; to fix
2. to clinch (a victory); to decide (the outcome of a match)
3. to persist in doing; to go through with
4. to always do; to have made a habit of as 決めている
5. to take for granted; to assume
6. to dress up; to dress to kill; to dress to the nines
7. to carry out successfully (a move in sports, a pose in dance, etc.); to succeed in doing
8. to immobilize with a double-arm lock (in sumo, judo, etc.) Martial arts, Sumo
9. to eat or drink something; to take illegal drugs
極める 【きめる】、キメる
1. to decide; to choose; to determine; to make up one's mind; to resolve; to set one's heart on; to settle; to arrange; to set; to appoint; to fix
2. to clinch (a victory); to decide (the outcome of a match)
3. to persist in doing; to go through with
4. to always do; to have made a habit of as 決めている
5. to take for granted; to assume
6. to dress up; to dress to kill; to dress to the nines
7. to carry out successfully (a move in sports, a pose in dance, etc.); to succeed in doing
8. to immobilize with a double-arm lock (in sumo, judo, etc.) Martial arts, Sumo
9. to eat or drink something; to take illegal drugs
極める 【きめる】、キメる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to be decided; to be settled; to be fixed; to be arranged いつ始めるのかはまだ決まっていない。It is still undecided when we will begin.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be unchanging; to be the same (as always); to be fixed; to be set as 決まっている or 決まった

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to be a fixed rule; to be destined; to be a convention; to be a custom; to be common knowledge as ...と決まっている

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to be well executed (of a manoeuvre in a sport, game, etc.); to go well; to succeed; to connect (of a punch)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to look good (of clothing); to look sharp; to be stylish; to suit one; to be held in place (of a hairdo)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to be struck and held (of a pose in kabuki)
決る 【きまる】、極る 【きまる】、キマる
決る: Irregular okurigana usage.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to reach an extreme; to reach a limit; to terminate; to come to an end

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Noun or verb acting prenominally, Godan verb with 'ru' ending

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb

1. polar regions; the pole

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to take for granted; to assume; to be convinced (that); to jump to the conclusion (that)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to pretend (to be); to pose (as); to fancy oneself (to be); to feign (e.g. ignorance) 本人は唯我独尊を決め込んでいるようだけども、周りから見れば単なるわがままだよね。He's completely convinced of his own greatness but to the people around him he's just a selfish jerk.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'mu' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to go through with (what one decided to do); to persist in doing; to make up one's mind 私は、議論が終わるのを辛抱強く待つことに決め込んだ。I decided to bide my time and wait for the argument to finish.
決めこむ 【きめこむ】、決込む 【きめこむ】、極め込む 【きめこむ】

sentences.translation: He's completely convinced of his own greatness but to the people around him he's just a selfish jerk.
I decided to bide my time and wait for the argument to finish.
